Text: RE TW Conoco in Lea County NM Cc Michelle I wanted to know about connecting into the suction of WT Not sure I have the name correct but the station located off of HWY CarlsbadHobbs Highway We have a line we are evaluating converting to lean gathering It passes about mile from this station Is it possible to connect there We will be looking for MMCFD initially and then increasing to if the volume shows up We currently have about MMCFD we would take into this point cet Original Message From Lokay Michelle SMTPMichelle NRONcom Sent Thursday June PM To Subject FW TW Conoco in Lea County NM Message Untitled Attachment File ATTATT
